movies.title: Black and White in Color
movies.plot: French colonists in Africa, several months behind in the news, find themselves at war with their German neighbors. Deciding that they must do their proper duty and fight the Germans, they promptly conscript the local native population. Issuing them boots and rifles, the French attempt to make "proper" soldiers out of the Africans. A young, idealistic French geographer seems to be the only rational person in the town, and he takes over control of the "war" after several bungles on the part of the others.
movies.simplePlot: French colonists in Africa, several months behind in the news, find themselves at war with their German neighbors. Deciding that they must do their proper duty and fight the Germans, they ...

biography.bio: Jean Carmet was born on April 25, 1920 in Bourgueil, Indre-et-Loire, France as Jean Gabriel Edmond Carmet. He was an actor and writer, known for Germinal (1993), Buffet froid (1979) and Black and White in Color (1976). He died on April 20, 1994 in Sèvres, Hauts-de-Seine, France.
biography.name: Jean Carmet

biography.bio: Jacques Dufilho was born on February 19, 1914 in Bègles, Gironde, France. He was an actor and director, known for War of the Buttons (1962), Nosferatu the Vampyre (1979) and Black and White in Color (1976). He died on August 28, 2005 in Paris, France.
biography.name: Jacques Dufilho

biography.bio: Catherine Rouvel was born on August 31, 1939 in Marseille, Bouches-du-Rhône, France as Catherine Vitale. She is an actress, known for Va Savoir (Who Knows?) (2001), Borsalino (1970) and Black and White in Color (1976).
biography.name: Catherine Rouvel

biography.bio: Jacques Spiesser was born on June 7, 1947 in Angers, France. He is an actor, known for Priceless (2006), Un homme qui dort (1974) and Commissaire Magellan (2009).
biography.name: Jacques Spiesser

biography.bio: Maurice Barrier was born on June 8, 1934 in La Flèche, Sarthe, France. He is an actor, known for The Return of Martin Guerre (1982), La vie et rien d'autre (1989) and The Fugitives (1986).
biography.name: Maurice Barrier

biography.bio: Benjamin Memel Atchory is an actor, known for Black and White in Color (1976).
biography.name: Benjamin Memel Atchory

biography.placeOfBirth: Obrawalde, Meseritz, West Prussia, Germany [now Obrzyce, Miedzyrzecz, Lubuskie, Poland]
biography.bio: Peter Berling was born on March 20, 1934 in Obrawalde, Meseritz, West Prussia, Germany. He is an actor and writer, known for Aguirre, the Wrath of God (1972), Gangs of New York (2002) and The Name of the Rose (1986).
biography.name: Peter Berling

biography.bio: Marius Beugre Boignan is an actor, known for Black and White in Color (1976).
biography.name: Marius Beugre Boignan

biography.bio: Claude Legros was born on January 26, 1932 in France. He is an actor, known for Black and White in Color (1976), That Night in Varennes (1982) and That Most Important Thing: Love (1975).
biography.name: Claude Legros

biography.bio: Dora Doll was born on May 19, 1922 in Berlin, Germany as Dorothea Hermina Feinberg. She was an actress, known for Touchez Pas au Grisbi (1954), Julia (1977) and The Young Lions (1958). She was married to François Deguelt and Raymond Pellegrin. She died on November 15, 2015 in Saint-Gilles, Gard, France.
biography.name: Dora Doll

biography.bio: Baye Macoumba Diop is an actor, known for Black and White in Color (1976).
biography.name: Baye Macoumba Diop

biography.bio: Jacques Monnet was born on January 18, 1934 in Concarneau, Finistère, France. He is an actor and writer, known for C'est pas ma faute! (1999), Dialogue avec mon jardinier (2007) and Signes extérieurs de richesse (1983).
biography.name: Jacques Monnet

biography.bio: Dieter Schidor was born on March 6, 1948 in Bienrode [now Brunswick], Lower Saxony, Germany. He was an actor and producer, known for Cross of Iron (1977), Querelle (1982) and La formule (1980). He died on September 17, 1987 in Munich, Bavaria, West Germany.
biography.name: Dieter Schidor

biography.bio: Aboubakar Toine is an actor, known for Black and White in Color (1976) and Afrique, je te plumerai (1992).
biography.name: Aboubakar Toine

biography.bio: Marc Zuber was born on May 5, 1944 in Lucknow, India. He was an actor, known for Robin Hood: Prince of Thieves (1991), Shirley Valentine (1989) and Navy Seals (1990). He died on May 28, 2003 in London, England.
biography.name: Marc Zuber
